author: kkolinko
msg: Simplify code that waits for threads to finish. This allows to shorten wait time if threads finish earlier.

author: kkolinko
msg: Simplify code that waits for threads to finish. This allows to shorten wait time if threads finish earlier.
A subtle difference is that Thread.join() is a synchronized method while Thread.isAlive() is not one.

author: kkolinko
msg: Improve ClientAbortException to provide non-null message in getMessage() and full class name in toString().

author: stefan2
msg: Follow-up to r1633967: Fix test failure with BDB.
This restores the original verify_txn_list and introduces a separate one
for the purge test.  FSFS and FSX backends don't distinguish between
"alive" and "dead" transactions but BDB does.  Use a sub-routine to
handle those differences generically.  As a side-effect, svn_fs_purge_txn
